name: Asteriodes - They Came For Chicken Nuggets
name_original: Asteriodes - They Came For Chicken Nuggets
description:
From the depths of outer space, comes a threat never before imagined.

Large, round, and hungry for chicken, they quickly approach our planet. 

They are the Asteriodes. 

Will they turn our world into an empty, nugget-less husk? 

Or will you take up the fight, and erase the over-eating menace?

The choice is yours.

Credits:
